description: This header file declares internal utility functions for parsing various components of HTTP messages, including request lines, headers, dates, media types, credentials, URIs, and other HTTP message parts.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRequestLineVersion
methods.description: Parses the HTTP version string to extract major and minor version numbers.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRquestLineUri
methods.description: Parses the URI part of an HTTP request line.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilCopyHeaderString
methods.description: Copies a string into a buffer, ensuring proper length handling.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilInitializeUri
methods.description: Initializes an HTTP request URI structure.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilLinearWhiteSpace
methods.description: Skips linear white space characters in a buffer.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseHttpDate
methods.description: Parses an HTTP date from a buffer.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRfc1123Date
methods.description: Parses an RFC1123 format date.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRfc850Date
methods.description: Parses an RFC850 format date.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAsciiTimeDate
methods.description: Parses an ASCII time date.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetDayOfWeek
methods.description: Converts day of week string into a numerical representation.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetWeekDayName
methods.description: Returns the string name of the weekday given its numerical value.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetMonth
methods.description: Converts a month string to its numerical representation.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetMonthName
methods.description: Returns the month name string for a given month number.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseDate1
methods.description: Parses a date in a specific date format.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseDate2
methods.description: Parses a date in another specific date format.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseDate3
methods.description: Parses a date in another specific date format.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseTime
methods.description: Parses a time component of a date.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseMediaRange
methods.description: Parses media range headers.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetMediaType
methods.description: Retrieves media type identifier based on string.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetMediaSubType
methods.description: Retrieves media subtype identifier based on string.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetQuality
methods.description: Extracts quality value from header.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetCharsetType
methods.description: Gets charset type from header value.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetEncodingType
methods.description: Gets encoding type from header value.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetMethodId
methods.description: Retrieves HTTP method identifier based on string.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseCredentials
methods.description: Parses HTTP credentials header.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseBasicCredentials
methods.description: Parses Basic authentication credentials.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseDigestCredentials
methods.description: Parses Digest authentication credentials.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAbsoluteURI
methods.description: Parses absolute URI from header.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRelativeURI
methods.description: Parses relative URI from header.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseNetPath
methods.description: Parses network path component of URI.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAbsPath
methods.description: Parses absolute path component of URI.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRelPath
methods.description: Parses relative path component of URI.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseMailBox
methods.description: Parses mailbox address.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAddrSpec
methods.description: Parses address specification in email headers.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseChallenge
methods.description: Parses challenge header for authentication.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetTransferEncoding
methods.description: Retrieves transfer encoding value.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAuthority
methods.description: Parses authority component of URI.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseAuthorityServer
methods.description: Parses server info in authority.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilParseRegName
methods.description: Parses registered name component of URI.

methods.name: HttpSmpoUtilGetNextCookieNameValuePair
methods.description: Extracts next cookie name/value pair from cookie header.
